input.sentences: i woke up and decided it was time to get the sled out .
we played in the snow all day and had a blast .
we took a break to warm up and have a quick dinner .
my cousin decided to bundle up and join in the fun afterwards .
there 's nothing like a little night sledding with family .
output.sentences: We woke up in time to go out on the sled.
We played in the snow all day.
We came in to get warm and have a quick dinner.
Others decided to join the fun.
We had a sledding night with the whole family.
